Package arcade.util

Class Graph.Edge

java.lang.Object
arcade.util.Graph.Edge
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GraphSites.SiteEdge
Enclosing class:
Graph
public abstract static class Graph.Edge
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Nested class representing a graph edge.

The edge tracks its corresponding nodes as well as the edges into the FROM node and out of the TO node.

See Also:
Serialized Form
